messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Be sure to tell your sins to our favorite man on the ship the chap, he'll slice right through your wrong deads with his sword of god. Go buy him a drink will ya?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Nut network's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: There appears to have been an AI malfunction, a monkey was inside the AI core running it with levers and switches. Security should be on high alert for monkeys.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Nut network have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Teleporter Room.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Come to the bridge if you want special powers from our man Phicoaneitgeyr the lord, he's a devil.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I don't advise trying to kill the devil, you'll get your shit kicked in.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We now have a shop on board our ship, visit arrivals to get your new wears and merch from our own ship Merchant

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Brig.

messages.author: Fi (AI)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">I am a robot! Beepity beep!</font>
